sqlMap.sql:
SELECT A.REP_ID
, A.TICKET_ID
, A.REP_RV , A.REP_RV_TYPE_CD , A.REP_COMMENT , TO_CHAR(A.REP_CMT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REP_CMT_DATE , A.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , A.REP_CHG_FILE_CNT , A.REP_RVN , A.GIT_CMT_SHA , A.GIT_BRC_NM FROM REP1100 A WHERE 1=1
AND A.TICKET_ID = 'SYSTEM'
AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND A.TICKET_ID IN ('SYSTEM', #ticketId#)
AND A.REP_ID = #repId#
AND A.REP_RV = #repRv#
AND A.REP_RVN = #repRvn#
AND LOWER(A.REP_CMT_AUTHOR) LIKE '%'|| LOWER(#searchTxt#) ||'%'
AND A.REP_COMMENT LIKE '%'|| #searchTxt# ||'%'
AND A.REP_CMT_DATE >= TO_DATE(#searchStDate# || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND A.REP_CMT_DATE <= TO_DATE(#searchEdDate# || ' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
AND A.REP_RVN >= #startRevisionVal#
AND A.REP_RVN <= #endRevisionVal#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT SUB.* FROM REP1101 SUB LEFT JOIN REP1000 B ON (SUB.REP_ID = B.REP_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND SUB.REP_RV = A.REP_RV
AND SUB.TICKET_ID IN ('SYSTEM', #ticketId#)
AND SUB.TICKET_ID = 'SYSTEM'
AND SUB.TICKET_ID = 'SYSTEM'
AND SUB.REP_ID = #repId#
AND ( (B.REP_TYPE_CD = '02' AND (SUB.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH LIKE '/'||#selRepPath#||'/%' OR SUB.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH LIKE '/'||#selRepPath#)) OR (B.REP_TYPE_CD != '02' AND (SUB.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH LIKE #selRepPath#||'/%' OR SUB.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH LIKE #selRepPath#)) )
)
GROUP BY A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_RV_TYPE_CD , A.REP_COMMENT , A.REP_CMT_DATE , A.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , A.REP_CHG_FILE_CNT
ORDER BY A.REP_RVN DESC

SELECT A.REP_ID , D.REP_NM , D.SVN_REP_URL , D.REP_TYPE_CD , A.REP_RV , A.REP_TARGET_RV , C.REP_COMMENT , C.REP_CMT_DATE , C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('REP00004', A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REP_CHG_TYPE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , C.REP_RVN , C.GIT_CMT_SHA , C.GIT_BRC_NM FROM REP1101 A
INNER JOIN ( SELECT IS1.* FROM REP1101 IS1 LEFT JOIN REP1100 IS2 ON(IS1.REP_ID = IS2.REP_ID AND IS1.REP_RV = IS2.REP_RV) WHERE (IS1.REP_ID, IS1.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, IS1.REP_CHG_FILE_NM, IS2.REP_CMT_DATE) IN ( SELECT S1.REP_ID ,S1.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ,S1.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ,MAX(S2.REP_CMT_DATE) AS REP_CMT_DATE FROM REP1101 S1 INNER JOIN REP1100 S2 ON (S1.REP_ID = S2.REP_ID AND S1.REP_RV = S2.REP_RV) WHERE 1 = 1 AND S1.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# GROUP BY S1.REP_ID, S1.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, S1.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) ) B ON (A.REP_ID = B.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = B.REP_RV AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH = B.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM = B.REP_CHG_FILE_NM) INNER JOIN REP1100 C ON (A.REP_ID = C.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = C.REP_RV AND A.TICKET_ID = C.TICKET_ID) INNER JOIN REP1000 D ON (A.REP_ID = D.REP_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND ( C.GIT_BRC_NM NOT LIKE '%trunkCommit' OR C.GIT_BRC_NM IS NULL ) AND C.REP_RV_TYPE_CD = #repRvTypeCd# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM REP1101 WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID = A.REP_ID AND TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID AND REP_TARGET_RV = A.REP_RV AND REP_TARGET_FILE_PATH = A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH )
AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND = #repChgfileKind#
AND UPPER( D.REP_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_RV ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND A.REP_RVN = #searchTxt#
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY C.REP_CMT_DATE DESC, A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM, A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD

SELECT A.REP_ID , E.REP_NM , E.SVN_REP_URL , E.REP_TYPE_CD , A.REP_RV , A.REP_TARGET_RV , D.REP_COMMENT , D.REP_CMT_DATE , D.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , SF_CMM1001_COM_CD_INFO('REP00004', A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD, '1') AS REP_CHG_TYPE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , D.REP_RVN , D.GIT_CMT_SHA , D.GIT_BRC_NM FROM REP1101 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM REP1100 WHERE 1 = 1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND ( GIT_BRC_NM LIKE '%trunkCommit' OR GIT_BRC_NM IS NULL ) ) B ON (A.REP_ID = B.REP_ID AND A.TICKET_ID = B.TICKET_ID AND A.REP_RV = B.REP_RV) INNER JOIN ( SELECT IS2.REP_ID ,IS2.REP_RV ,IS2.TICKET_ID ,IS1.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ,IS1.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ,IS2.REP_RVN ,IS1.REP_TARGET_RV ,IS2.GIT_BRC_NM FROM REP1101 IS1 LEFT JOIN REP1100 IS2 ON(IS1.REP_ID = IS2.REP_ID AND IS1.REP_RV = IS2.REP_RV) WHERE (IS1.REP_ID, IS1.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, IS1.REP_CHG_FILE_NM, IS2.REP_CMT_DATE) IN ( SELECT S1.REP_ID ,S1.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ,S1.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ,MAX(S2.REP_CMT_DATE) AS REP_CMT_DATE FROM REP1101 S1 INNER JOIN REP1100 S2 ON (S1.REP_ID = S2.REP_ID AND S1.REP_RV = S2.REP_RV) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( S2.GIT_BRC_NM LIKE '%trunkCommit' OR S2.GIT_BRC_NM IS NULL ) AND S1.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# GROUP BY S1.REP_ID, S1.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, S1.REP_CHG_FILE_NM )
AND ( IS2.GIT_BRC_NM NOT LIKE 'operation%' OR IS2.GIT_BRC_NM IS NULL ) ) C ON (A.REP_ID = C.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = C.REP_RV AND A.TICKET_ID = C.TICKET_ID AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH = C.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM = C.REP_CHG_FILE_NM) INNER JOIN REP1100 D ON (A.REP_ID = D.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = D.REP_RV AND A.TICKET_ID = D.TICKET_ID) INNER JOIN REP1000 E ON (A.REP_ID = E.REP_ID) WHERE 1 = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM REP1101 WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID = A.REP_ID AND TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID AND REP_TARGET_RV = A.REP_RV AND REP_TARGET_FILE_PATH = A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH )
AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND = #repChgfileKind#
AND UPPER( E.REP_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_RV ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND A.REP_RVN = #searchTxt#
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( D.REP_CMT_AUTHOR ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY D.REP_CMT_DATE DESC, A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ASC, A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD ASC

SELECT A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.CI_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_NUM , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , A.REP_CHG_SEL_CD , A.COMMIT_EMP_ID , C.REP_COMMENT , C.REP_CMT_DATE , C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , D.REP_NM , D.DPL_REP_URL , D.REP_TYPE_CD , C.REP_RVN , C.GIT_CMT_SHA , C.GIT_BRC_NM FROM REP1102 A INNER JOIN ( SELECT TICKET_ID, CI_ID, REP_ID, JOB_ID, MAX(BLD_NUM) AS MAX_BLD_NUM, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM FROM REP1102 WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# GROUP BY TICKET_ID, CI_ID, REP_ID, JOB_ID, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH, REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) B ON ( A.TICKET_ID = B.TICKET_ID AND A.CI_ID = B.CI_ID AND A.REP_ID = B.REP_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID AND A.BLD_NUM = B.MAX_BLD_NUM AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH = B.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH AND A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM = B.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) INNER JOIN REP1100 C ON (A.REP_ID = C.REP_ID AND A.REP_RV = C.REP_RV AND C.TICKET_ID = A.TICKET_ID AND C.REP_RV_TYPE_CD = '03') INNER JOIN REP1000 D ON (A.REP_ID = D.REP_ID AND D.DPL_USE_CD = '01') WHERE 1=1
AND A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD != '03'
AND A.REP_CHG_SEL_CD = #repChgSelCd#
AND UPPER( D.REP_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_RV ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_RVN ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.REP_CMT_AUTHOR ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( A.BLD_NUM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
ORDER BY A.CI_ID, A.REP_ID, A.REP_RV, A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH

SELECT A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.CI_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_NUM , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , A.COMMIT_EMP_ID , A.REP_RVN FROM REP1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND A.CI_ID = #ciId# AND A.REP_ID = #repId# AND A.REP_CHG_SEL_CD = '01'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_RV_TYPE_CD , A.REP_COMMENT , A.REP_CMT_DATE , A.REP_CMT_AUTHOR , A.REP_CHG_FILE_CNT , A.REP_RVN , A.GIT_CMT_SHA , A.GIT_BRC_NM FROM REP1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND A.REP_ID = #repId#
AND A.GIT_BRC_NM = #gitBrcNm#
AND A.REP_RV = #repRv#

SELECT T1.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, SUBT1.*
, #ticketId# AS TICKET_ID
FROM (
) SUBT1 ) T1 WHERE 1= 1

SELECT A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , A.REP_TARGET_RV , A.REP_TARGET_FILE_PATH , A.COMMIT_EMP_ID , A.REP_RVN FROM REP1101 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND A.REP_ID = #repId#
AND A.REP_RV = #repRv#
AND A.REP_RVN = #repRvn#

SELECT A.TICKET_ID , A.REP_ID , A.REP_RV , A.REP_CHG_ID , A.CI_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_NUM , A.REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , A.REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , A.REP_CHG_FILE_NM , A.REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , A.COMMIT_EMP_ID , A.REP_RVN FROM REP1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId#
AND A.CI_ID = #ciId# AND A.REP_ID = #repId#
AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId#
AND A.BLD_NUM = #bldNum#
AND A.REP_RV = #repRv#
AND A.REP_RVN = #repRvn#
AND A.REP_CHG_SEL_CD = #repChgSelCd#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REP1100 ( TICKET_ID , REP_ID , REP_RV , REP_RV_TYPE_CD , REP_COMMENT , REP_CMT_DATE , REP_CMT_AUTHOR , REP_CHG_FILE_CNT , REP_RVN , GIT_CMT_SHA , GIT_BRC_NM ) VALUES ( #ticketId# , #repId# , #repRv# , #repRvTypeCd# , #repComment# , TO_DATE(#repCmtDate#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , #repCmtAuthor# , #repChgFileCnt# , #repRvn# , #gitCmtSha# , #gitBrcNm# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REP1100 SET REP_COMMENT = #repComment# , REP_CMT_DATE = #repCmtDate# , REP_CMT_AUTHOR = #repCmtAuthor# , REP_CHG_FILE_CNT = #repChgFileCnt# WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND REP_ID = #repId# AND REP_RV = #repRv#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_REP_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_REP_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REP_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(REP_CHG_ID) AS NEW_REP_CHG_ID FROM REP1101 A WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID = #repId# AND REP_RV = #repRv# AND REP_CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO REP1101 ( TICKET_ID , REP_ID , REP_RV , REP_CHG_ID , REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , REP_CHG_FILE_NM , REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , REP_TARGET_RV , REP_TARGET_FILE_PATH , COMMIT_EMP_ID , REP_RVN ) VALUES ( #ticketId# , #repId# , #repRv# , #newRepChgId# , #repChgTypeCd# , #repChgFilePath# , #repChgFileNm# , #repChgFileKind# , #repTargetRv# , #repTargetFilePath# , #commitEmpId# , #repRvn# )

SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_REP_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_REP_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_REP_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(REP_CHG_ID) AS NEW_REP_CHG_ID FROM REP1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND CI_ID = #ciId# AND REP_ID = #repId# AND REP_RV = #repRv# AND REP_CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO REP1102 ( TICKET_ID , REP_ID , REP_RV , REP_CHG_ID , CI_ID , JOB_ID , BLD_NUM , REP_CHG_TYPE_CD , REP_CHG_FILE_PATH , REP_CHG_FILE_NM , REP_CHG_FILE_KIND , REP_CHG_SEL_CD , COMMIT_EMP_ID , REP_RVN ) VALUES ( #ticketId# , #repId# , #repRv# , #newRepChgId# , #ciId# , #jobId# , #bldNum# , #repChgTypeCd# , #repChgFilePath# , #repChgFileNm# , #repChgFileKind# , #repChgSelCd# , #commitEmpId# , #repRvn# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM REP1101 WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND REP_ID = #repId# AND REP_RV = #repRv#
AND REP_CHG_ID = #repChgId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, SUBT1.* FROM (
) SUBT1 ) T1 WHERE T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, SUBT1.* FROM (
) SUBT1 ) T1 WHERE T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CI_ID, TICKET_ID, REP_ID, JOB_ID, MAX(BLD_NUM) AS MAX_BLD_NUM, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH FROM REP1102 WHERE 1=1 AND CI_ID = #ciId# AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND REP_ID = #repId# AND JOB_ID = #jobId# AND REP_CHG_FILE_PATH = #repChgFilePath# GROUP BY CI_ID, TICKET_ID, REP_ID, JOB_ID, REP_CHG_FILE_PATH ) T1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REP1102 SET REP_CHG_SEL_CD = #repChgSelCd# , COMMIT_EMP_ID = #commitEmpId# WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND CI_ID = #ciId# AND REP_ID = #repId# AND REP_RV = #repRv# AND REP_CHG_ID = #repChgId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T1.* FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.REP_RVN) AS MAX_REP_RV FROM REP1101 A INNER JOIN REP1100 B ON (A.REP_ID = B.REP_ID AND A.TICKET_ID = B.TICKET_ID AND A.REP_RV = B.REP_RV) WHERE 1=1 AND A.TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND A.REP_ID = #repId# AND B.REP_RV_TYPE_CD = '02' ) T1
SELECT MAX(REP_RVN) AS MAX_REP_RV FROM REP1100 WHERE 1=1 AND TICKET_ID = #ticketId# AND REP_RV_TYPE_CD = '02'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT REP_ID, PATH, EMP_ID FROM TEMP WHERE 1=1 AND SUCC_CD = '01' ) T1
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TEMP SET SUCC_CD = '02' WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID = #repId# AND PATH = #path#
